mapper.insert: insert into ReviewReply(commentNo, reviewNo, userid, reply) values (#{commentNo}, #{reviewNo},#{userid},#{reply})
mapper.select: select auto_increment from information_schema.TABLES where table_name = 'ReviewReply'
select * from ReviewReply where reviewNo = #{reviewNo} order by commentNo;
mapper.update: update ReviewReply set reply = #{reply} , regdate = current_timestamp where replyNo = #{replyNo};
